description: A partial fill for each point, typically used to visualize how much of a task is performed. The partial fill object can be set either on series or point level.

children.name: amount
children.description: The amount of the X-range point to be filled. Values can be 0-1 and are converted to percentages in the default data label formatter.

children.name: fill
children.description: The fill color to be used for partial fills. Defaults to a darker shade of the point color.
